introduction: In the distant galaxy, on a planet, there are thousands of a race called Earthling, working day and night. At the very beginning of the birth of race, they had found the terminal theory of the universe - Time. The time on the planet is generated by labor. Triggered by working, thinking, expression, consumption, mating and breeding, Earth keeps rolling, accordingly Earthlings survive. But one day, the beautiful dreamland has a new challenge. An immoral alien troop arrives in the solar system. The obscene creators wanna colonize the planet and the resources so they can maintain the lewd and erotic life…
